comment: Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :ARG0 (r / racist)))
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 c)
            :mod (h2 / hey
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (r2 / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 c))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :mod (o / other)))))
      :snt3 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))

comment: Your offensive comments are not welcome.  Thank you in advance for removing.
amr:
# ::snt Your offensive comments are not welcome.  Thank you in advance for removing.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / welcome-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG0-of (o / offend-01)))
      :snt2 (t / thank-01
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)
            :ARG2 (r / remove-01
                  :ARG0 y2)
            :ARG1-of (ii / in-advance-04)))

comment: Anti-Islamic hate speech is not allowed here. Remember: there's no room for hate in our world.
amr:
# ::snt Anti-Islamic hate speech is not allowed here. Remember: there's no room for hate in our world.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / allow-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01)
                  :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01
                        :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Islam"))))
            :location (h2 / here))
      :snt2 (r2 / remember-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (r3 / room
                  :polarity -
                  :purpose (h3 / hate-01)
                  :location (w / world
                        :poss (w2 / we)))))
